title: datalad SingularityHub container does not run on newer versions of singularity
body:
#### What is the problem?

The instructions on the datalad website give the very nice option of running datalad with a simple singularity pull.  However if the machine that you are launching on has singularity > 2.4.1, then you receive errors.

#### What steps will reproduce the problem?
On a machine that has singularity 2.5.1-dist:
`singularity pull shub://datalad/datalad:fullmaster`
then
`datalad install -r -g -s ///abide/RawDataBIDS/CMU_a ./X`
